verbatim_example: It's been just over a week without bupe.
My thinking is still foggy from the Kratom, but it doesn't do much in regards to anxiety. Right now I imagine that the benzo W/Ds are still most of it,
I didn't sleep for a 4 day span in the past 2 weeks. I get so easily over-whelmed, and that feeling is really magnified when I stop dosing.
Going outside feels so terrifying, esp when I am physically shaking and in constant cold sweats.
I thought the benzo withdrawals kicked in that first week but now that I look back I think it was primarily opiate withdrawals.
The withdrawal was really intense, I was stuck to my apartment for almost the entire 3 weeks.
I am in the thick of wd.
The wrestless legs still won't quit.
I am scared bc I know I will want to use.
I am happy to be here, sober .
Every year, Ive celebrated by getting as high as possible. Not this year. I celebrated by not using.
Still have the morning GI lingering around but the malaise is still the biggest pain in the ass.
I still blow up the bathroom in the morning but it doesn't persist all day.
I get these random flashes of old feelings that shoot through me for a few seconds-minutes. I try to slow down in those moments to actually feel some shit.
Yesterday went pretty well other than a few cases of the clammy sweats.
Yesterday was okay minus a crazy afternoon episode of the sweats. I fuckin hate that feeling.
Symptoms at 3 weeks out... broken sleep of 4-6 hours, morning shits (a very zen one this morning at least), anhedonia waves, come and go restless limbs.
Sunday morning the fog rolled back in. Emotional, tons of GI issues, anxiety sweats, depressed, stir crazy, irritable, restless. Felt like day 4 of withdrawals out of the blue.
I've now gone five days without
Got lots of benzos just in case.
I was so fucked up on dope and xanax and kpins that i blacked out the entire way.

I was in absolutel agony, I literally layed in the shower crying for like 12 hours, every inch of my body hurt, migraines, sweating like a dog even though my condo was 62 degrees, throwing up, I was so tired but couldn't even lay on my bed because the RLS would start up instantly.
I'm going to get totally straight hamstered!

I bought some Kratom, and have some muscle relaxers for the withdrawl I may experience. But, truth be told - my withdrawl isn't anywhere near what I've seen in others. Bone pain and exhaustion is about it.
I’m over 1 year into sobriety and I still am very sensitive to the cold. It’s not horrible by any means, but I literally hate being cold it.
I been in the bathroom all day puking and shitting. When i try to eat or drink liquids all i do is puke them back up.
"Must Not Sleep… must warn others"- I got this cause to me it's about staying self aware and in the moment which is a huge part of recovery and growing as a person.
This wheel that I'm grateful for everyday that I don't have to be on.

When I had got there I was still pissed and made a promise to myself that I’d only stay there for a week, I mean I had front row seats to a Green Day concert along with having one of my “ best friends” moving back to NM. I had missions to go and bust. After a week, I realized how truly sick I was and that I truly need to stay.
I'm currently finishing up my fifth day sober-ish (on xanax rn) and through the worst of the physical WDs.
I need that rush... I'd rather have artificial happiness than genuine depression... All I want is a bump. A line. A shot. All I want is to be numb.
I can't stand being alive, I just want to fall asleep and never wake up. Because then I would never get to feel the sweet embrace of heroin again.
I was feeling extremely depressed, sweating, cold, jittery/RLS, classic mild WDs.
I’ll be with you until I die, cold and blue, fading away in your sweet embrace.
Currently working on an immodium taper, because I cannot deal with the vomiting, which I get REALLY bad during w/ds.
I used to only get it in my legs, but this time it's all over, arms, legs, hands, feet, torso???
I have the worst headache of my life achey and chilly, when I'm not feeling on fire.
It's like ice picks in my brain.
I'm also ice cold, is that a withdrawal thing?
Bye-bye Egghead U, I'm going the hell home to a bath (my back!) and some sleep.
I enjoy the sun on my skin, even when it's -10°C outside.
By the time the conversation was over I wanted to be drunk or high, god I was frustrated.
I was addicted to heroin again after my first stint in rehab got me almost 6 months of sobriety.
This shit takes the withdrawals away but it is almost not even worth it.
kicked my h habit about 3 weeks ago and haven’t had the urge to use more than every now and then since
since i recently quit heroin my tolerance is pretty low
when you feel you need to get out at moments of clarity and joy let it happen to let the Trick know what they have been missing. It doesn't have to be 24hr lockdown after the initial withdrawls.
If I did not dose every 5-6 hours the chills would set in, and I knew just how screwed I truley was.
Took the subs for 7 days, still felt a bit strange during that time. Probably the kratom withdrawal under the subs.
I was in brutal pain and going through withdrawals such as the tingling sensations.
I never get withdrawals; I use to but got past the worst of my addiction and now I only use two times a week give or take a day.
I always push the boundaries and end up falling out on my friend who will slap me, pour water on me, etc just to try and wake me up which he is always unsuccessful. I'm always out cold.
Lope definitely helped my withdrawals the first three days and then when I woke up on the 4th day, I felt completely fine.
Heroin was fun for the time being, I'd chase that high right before I nod out and my lips turn blue.
Shooting dope became a urgency as I'd wake up frantically and call everybody trying to find someone to rip off or some way to score.

I can compare the blissfulness and content to that of a heroin shot. Even better in my mind. The rush of warmth was unfathomable; I spaced out. No thoughts, no ideas, no concerns. Just blank consciousness.

Well the waves are about 4 feet and I was just admiring the view after a long workout session. ... Well my dog started barking, and unbeknownst to me there was a duck frozen completely to the ground with a broken beak frantically trying to escape.
I remember endless aching Timeless nights spent sleepless, taking anything to stop the shaking,
i am lifeless, i am cold
my hands are swollen as fuck, and to my feet is covered by blood
my eyes are watering like I’m almost crying for no reason so thats fun
They gave me something to make my adrenaline chill, and that killed almost all symptoms.
The problem tho is that I have had mild withdrawals after that.
I had to start the wd all over but it is like 1/3 painfull so I am actually enjoying myself.
Being clean is hard but if I keep it up mabye some day I won’t have to keep fighting the urge to use or to kill myself.
On Monday I’ll be 3 days into WD and will have to go back to work still dopesick
I am not going to go back and accept I made a mistake but did I just put myself back at day one again of withdraws?
I’ve been done the physical withdraws for like a week now

My dealer always told me if I ever wanted to quit he would completely cut me off and I finally gave him the word and he completely cut me off lol. ... These ideas always sound so great when your high as a kite lol but now that I’m in the thick of it I want to shoot myself
today I woke up around the same time and woke up sweaty with chills and hot flashes
what started as a good high became maintenance we lost everything due to missing work due to withdrawals and kept coming back to it

we are trying to figure out what we need to look into over the weekend, despite losing it all I am glad I can say we don't have to worry about where money will come and trying to get through each day without having to WD
Until one day I just had to leave because I was dope sick
Luckily I've only been using everyday for about 3 weeks, but fuck. I'm 24 hours into withdraw and it's tough. I have to say I don't feel as bad, physically, as I did when coming off oxy.
Today is day 13 for me! This is the longest I've been sober since summer 2011, and first time I'm really sober.
I feel like I am getting cold,
While I am currently keeping withdrawals at bay with 10 - 20mg a day of OC (I was pretty steady at 50 - 100mg a day, every day)
I, then, remember that I have fifty fucking adderalls in my closet. I take one, and I feel no more WD,
I had my last oxy yesterday morning -- then I had about 1mg of sub last night, and I'm 100% dry
Even on a sunny day, I'm shivering, and my nose is draining.
I've had to call on my clean friends and therapist every single day for the past week. Hanging on for dear life here.
It's the middle of November and it's 15 degrees Celsius outside right now (60 degrees in American), it's gorgeous but I just feel like I want to grab all of a sudden.
Right now I'm at home, winter has finally hit Ontario and I'm all like "don't make the call, don't make the call".
Unable to keep any food or even water down.
Even now, on day 6 and just barely through the worst of the physical symptoms, my desire to use is still there.
I'm an addict in early recovery (Feb. 22)

After my 4th day being dope sick I bumped into this homeless women I used to always break off when she was sick,she asked how I was doing I told her I was 4 days sober she asked if I wanted some I told her no, after that day I knew I was done
I have been homeless have boosted and done various other things for a daily fix.

We started using together and he was shocked when he had the same shit happening to him. We were hanging out and smoking with our friend one day and brought this up to him and he was like damn guys, you're kicking!
I'm withdrawing and will be up aaall night. Would KILL for some benzos or something, but it is what it is.
I swear the withdrawals are just as bad if not worse than last time I detoxed even though I was doing significantly less, diff ROA and shorter time period.
Far from my first rodeo but I'm at the breaking point. I'm just trying to not let myself leave the house right now.
this morning was the worst so far. Haven't slept still at all, just absolutely miserable and losing my mind.
This freezing weather is the definition of cold turkey lol. Absolutely miserable.
does anyone with experience on heroin withdrawal know how much longer my body will feel like hell?
cold turkey couldn't take the withdrawals I was flopping and moaning in pain like a fish.
it's not treating me well and my friends are at work and my girlfriend gave up lmao I'm ready to fucking quit, it's not the high for me that keeps me on it it's running from the WD
Well I understand that made it 30x worse. I'm eating 20 mix of pills (clonodine, diazepam, visteril, tylonal and whatever helps until my dealer wakes up) and that barely keeps the WD at bay.
I wake up in severe pain if I haven't used within 12 hours.
I started withdrawing 18 hours out. I'm talking puking and everything so I just went back to what I knew fixed it.

I wish that life was easier, & I could just take some time off without having to worry about money. To think that there are people who can afford to go to recovery resorts, & I am stuck kissing other peoples asses with cold sweats.

If I had a cold, I would be able to distract/occupy myself enough to be indifferent to my cold. In full blown opiate withdrawal, I am lucky to get an hour of sleep without her constantly on the front of my mind.
This song describes what I feel during WD, in a round-about way. Especially the part where he says "cold as can be".
I haven't been tempted even once.
I can't imagine being out in the rain or snow and experiencing withdrawal, praying that someone will come through or that you can scrounge up enough money to pick up and not be sick.
Seems to help the chills, and I'm sweating anyway, so why not let it flow.
My eyes are watering and I'm sneezing
I'm finally over the worst of WD
He was still pale and sweating but now crying from the pain of precipitated w/d.

What I didn't expect from methadone that I have been so pleasantly surprised by, is the sense of freedom. Within the first week I felt like my cell door had been unlocked. Not having to wake up sick, or spend the first hour(s) of every day making myself hurt and bleed in search of a vein..no being cornered into trusting scary, violent, or creepy ppl, no putting myself the way of the law or danger out of desperation...
I went 9 days straight fucked up basically all day.
I don't know why I've been fucking up so badly lately. But I can't seem to get more than a few days clean. This is the beginning of day 4. It's longest I've gone since getting 30 days.
edit: GOD I CAN'T STOP SNEEZING. It's driving me INSANE.
And inside is some of the best dope I've ever snorted!
Days one and two were god awful; my whole body hurt

This week my mom found a bunch of rigs (thankfully she didn't find my stash) and we decided I should go to inpatient again. ... This week I've shot somewhere around ~100 bags and a little bit of coke since last Friday.
I currently take 20mg opana and 120mg oxycodone daily.
before the dope sickness kicked in
